bibl.title: The Syllabic Word-Lists in P. Bour. 1 Reconsidered.

series.title: American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition

bibl.note: "Editio minor" of P. Bouriant 1 (= M.-P.3 2643; LDAB 2744) containing a new transcription of the lists accompanied by some findings. - Arrangement of the lists. - An exercise in orthography and pronunciation? - Attic Comedy. - "Grammatical" sources. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: Adam HYATT (Assistant Editor), Proceedings of the 25th International Congress of Papyrology. Ann Arbor, July 29 - August 4, 2007

bibl.seg: BAPLU Nele, Marc HUYS and Thomas SCHMIDT, The Syllabic Word-Lists in P. Bour. 1 Reconsidered.

Traianos GAGOS (Editor), Adam HYATT (Assistant Editor), Proceedings of the 25th International Congress of Papyrology. Ann Arbor, July 29 - August 4, 2007 = American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition (Ann Arbor, 2010) pp. 53-65.

"Editio minor" of P. Bouriant 1 (= M.-P.3 2643; LDAB 2744) containing a new transcription of the lists accompanied by some findings. - Arrangement of the lists. - An exercise in orthography and pronunciation? - Attic Comedy. - "Grammatical" sources. - Conclusion.
